title: HOUR 2 - Herd Hierarchy
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Herd Hierarchy
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin reveals his “Herd Hierarchy.” Browns HC Kevin Stefanski discusses his faith in QB Baker Mayfield, yet the Browns are stuck with a lack of trade value in Mayfield. Plus, FOX Sports CFB/NFL Analyst Brock Huard joins Colin to discuss NFL storylines and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
